meanings: (시력·청력을 잃다) (눈이) go blind, lose one's sight; (귀가) go deaf, lose one's hearing

vlive.korean: 너무 멀어요 여러분? 조금 가까이 갈까? Am I too far? Do you want me to go closer to the camera? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Am I too far? Do you want me to go closer to the camera?

vlive.korean: [빛 때문인 게 맞네... 코풍이 후광에 렌즈도 눈이 멀어] 빛 때문인가? [Your aura ruined the lense] Is it because of the light? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [KANGDANIEL] 울 말랑복숭아 누르지 마세요!! 녹아요(주르륵-)🍑💦 (DANIEL’s so cute reaction)
vlive.english: [Your aura ruined the lense] Is it because of the light?

vlive.korean: 너무 멀어요? Is it too far? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이의 연습실😎#4
너무 멀어! - 멀어요! You are too far. - It's too far! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 히짱데이🥳💕
vlive.english: You are too far. - It's too far!

vlive.korean: 자양동 멀어요? Is it far from here? 듣기 View video NCT : [BOOM!] 🤴&🐹&💚&☀️시즈니와 함께 애프터눈 티타임☕️

examples.korean: It’s too far to walk—I’ll take you by car. 발음듣기 거긴 걸어가기엔 너무 멀어. 내가 차로 데려다 줄게. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s too far to walk—I’ll take you by car. 발음

examples.korean: We could go into town but it’s a real hike from here. 발음듣기 우리가 시내로 갈 수도 있겠지만 거기가 여기서는 정말 멀어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We could go into town but it’s a real hike from here. 발음

examples.korean: His passion for her made him blind to everything else. 발음듣기 그는 그녀에 대한 욕정에 눈이 멀어 다른 것은 아무것도 보이지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His passion for her made him blind to everything else. 발음

examples.korean: I’m not working there—for a start, it’s too far to travel. 발음듣기 전 그곳에서 일하지 않아요. 우선 거기는 다니기가 너무 멀어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m not working there—for a start, it’s too far to travel. 발음

examples.korean: ‘I can walk home.’ ‘Don’t be silly—it’s much too far!’ 발음듣기 “난 집까지 걸어갈 수 있어.” “바보 같이 굴지 마. 그러기엔 너무나 멀어!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I can walk home.’ ‘Don’t be silly—it’s much too far!’ 발음
